query.sql:
WITH ucf_name AS(
SELECT
CONCAT('user_field_', id) AS name
FROM user_fields
WHERE name = 'Newsletter'
)

SELECT
u.id AS user_id,
u.username AS username,
ucf.value
FROM users u
JOIN user_custom_fields ucf
ON ucf.user_id = u.id
WHERE ucf.name = (SELECT name FROM ucf_name)
query.name: user_newsletter
